svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.1.0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="TW7uT88QEO0QqgSNGXjV"> <mxGraphModel dx="1240" dy="538" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="oxWiwY1kdeuA2wG3ep4T-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="130" width="360" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oxWiwY1kdeuA2wG3ep4T-2" value="" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="180" width="95" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oxWiwY1kdeuA2wG3ep4T-3" value="A 收到 500<div>A 轉給 B 100</div><div>...</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="337.5" y="230" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oxWiwY1kdeuA2wG3ep4T-4" value="公開佈告欄" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="337.5" y="150" width="82.5" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oxWiwY1kdeuA2wG3ep4T-5" value="" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="370" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oxWiwY1kdeuA2wG3ep4T-6" value="A 還有 400 可以用" style="shape=callout;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;perimeter=calloutPerimeter;position2=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="390" y="320" width="110" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 129px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
A 收到 500
A 轉給 B 100
...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 81px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 129px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 205px; margin-left: 181px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
